wikipedia_page.main: Ian Barker (born 10 August 1966 in Cardiff) is a British sailor. He won a silver medal in the High Performance Dinghy class at the 2000 Summer Olympics with Simon Hiscocks. He now lives in Christchurch England. He now coaches the Irish 49er team for Rio 2016 Olympics.
